articles.title: 'Bad luck, but it was a red card': Bok coach Nienaber on Du Toit's costly sending off - News24
articles.description: "Bad luck, but it was a red card," was Springbok coach Jacques Nienaber's response to Pieter-Steph du Toit's 11th minute red card in South Africa's loss to France.
articles.content: • Springbok coach Jacques Nienaber said Pieter-Steph du Toit's red card was deserved when the loose forward was sent off in South Africa's 30-26 loss to France in Marseille on Saturday.
